src_original: prathamadhyānasamāpatteś ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,  ye cānye prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyante,
evam ātmanā ca dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpattavyaṃ,
pare ca caturthe dhyāne samādāpayitavyāś caturthadhyānasamāpatteś ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,  ye cānye caturthadhyānaṃ samāpadyante,  teṣāñ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena.
ye cānye maitrīvihāriṇas teṣām api varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena.  evaṃ karuṇāyāṃ muditāyāṃ ca kartavyam,
upekṣāvihārasya ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,  ye cānye upekṣāvihāriṇas,
ātmanā cākāśānantyāyatanāsamāpattiḥ samāpattavyā,  pare cākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattau samādāpayitavyāḥ,
evaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattir ākiṃcānyāyatanasamāpattiḥ,  ātmanā ca naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattiḥ samāpattavyā,
pare ca naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattau samādāpayitavyāḥ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpatteś ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,
ātmanā cāryaṣṭāṅgo mārgo bhāvayitavyaḥ,  pare cāryāṣṭāṅge mārge sthāpayitavyāḥ,
ye cānye sattvā āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayanti,  teṣāṃ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ (PSP_4:138)
āryasatyānāṃ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,  ye cānye sattvāś catvāry āryasatyāni bhāvayanti,
navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,  ye cānye sattvā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ samāpadyante,  teṣāṃ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena.
abhijñānāṃ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,  ye cānye sattvā abhijñā pratilabdhās,  teṣāṃ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena.
daśānāṃ ca tathāgatabalānāṃ varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,  ye cānye sattvā daśatathāgatabalāni paripūrayanti,
aṣṭādaśāveṇikānāṃ ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,  ye cānye āveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrayanti,
teṣāṃ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena.  ātmanā ca mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā ca paripūrayitavyā,
pare ca mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ ca samādāpayitavyā,
